CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: High Explosive
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Designed to explode, damaging targets in a large area.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Incendiary
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Designed to spray a fiery mixture that hits targets over a large area.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Сluster
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Designed to deliver a cluster bomb that hits a target over a large area.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Antimaterial
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Designed to deliver bombs with antimatter particles that hit a target over a very large area.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: EMP
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Designed to deliver bombs with EMP particles that hit a target over a very large area.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Nuclear
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Small nuclear warhead missile that hit a target over a very large area.
